name: Alchemist Adventure Prologue
description:
Enjoy this introduction to the game, which features the opening chapter of Alchemist Adventure that you can play for free. In the prologue, you wake up in an unknown dungeon with no memories or understanding of what happened to you and who you are. As you try to remember who you were, you’ll start your journey in an abandoned region of Isur.

Formerly a home of brilliant yet dangerous alchemists, Isur is now ruined by the ravages of a near-endless war. During your adventure you will not only learn the story of the conflict, but also get to know why it feels so important to you now.




  • Discover a mysterious world — Travel through different locations, from laboratories and dungeons, to a factory inside a volcano. Each region offers many challenges, hidden secrets, different enemies to fight, and lore to discover.


  • Combine elements and make all kinds of potions — Use the four basic elements (fire, water, air, earth) along with special ingredients to create bombs, elixirs, and sword oils.


  • Transform the world around you — Interact with the environment using alchemy. Raise the water level of a lake, cross a river by creating ice platforms, use the wind to move objects, and create lightning to start an engine!


  • Solve alchemical puzzles — Combine elements to open chests, make paths, or find hidden objects.


  • Fight fearsome foes — Use elements to discover enemies’ weaknesses and try different strategies to defeat them. Large or small, every enemy has its achilles heel, and your alchemy will find and exploit it!


  • Switch between characters or play co-op — Join the journey as a flying homunculus that can fight, solve puzzles, and collect resources, or play co-op with a friend as Mya and her homunculus.
